reviewText: This was a Christmas present for my mother.  I myself have not seen this movie but my mother loves it and is very happy to have it.
The DVD never worked. Disappointing because it was a gift for mom.  Seller did refund the money though.

From a mans point of view excellent from the beginning, from my wife's point by the end it was excellent.
You can't go wrong with any of her titles, superb productions.
a really good adaptation of catherine cooksons book, tilly  trotter.  too bad they did not make the other segments of this book
